page.title: 16Housing
page.content: Our block has all the range of housing typical in Britain, but the majority of them are middle class owner occupiers. In the part of Oundle in our block, most of the houses have been built since 1945. There are some council houses but most are privately owned. The village (Glapthorn) contains about 60 houses of which 14 are council houses. Some of them have been built post 1945, and about 15 of them are farm workers cottages that have been conerted, and enlarged, for families moving into the village from outside. This process continues. It is a very pleasant area to live.
